front.title: Hydroponics Station
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on any exterior Tatooine site. Cannot be moved. The first Force you activate during your activate phase may be drawn into hand instead. If a Vaporator on table, the second Force you activate may also be drawn into hand.
front.lore: Grows fruits and vegetables. Very efficient water use. Often underground. Feeds moisture farm families, but excess vegetables are often sold at markets.
